overview: After ridding Gotham City of all crime and villainy, the Caped Crusader Batmon has gained a little weight and lost muscle mass, while enjoying frequent pizza dinners. His current bout with sloth allows an aging Catwoman to steal the Batcopter and hide it in an undisclosed location on the Marshall Islands.
tagline: He thought capturing Catwoman in the Marshall Islands would be easy...He was wrong
title: BATMoN vs MAJURo
